mapper.select: SELECT tb_user.id, tb_user.employee_number, tb_user.nick_name, tb_user.user_pwd, tb_user.mobile, tb_user.email, tb_user_token.expiration_time, tb_user.is_admin FROM tb_user_token INNER JOIN tb_user ON tb_user_token.user_id = tb_user.id WHERE tb_user.is_deleted = 0 AND tb_user_token.is_deleted = 0 AND tb_user_token.token = #{token, jdbcType=VARCHAR}
